text: El Salvador has been in thirteen Summer Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee's official abbreviation for El Salvador is ESA."Abbreviations, National Olympic Committees," 2009 Annual Report, p. 90 [PDF p. 91 of 94]; retrieved 2012-10-12. In 1964, it was SAL for "salvador". "Official abbreviations" at The Games of the XVIII Olympiad, Tokyo, 1964, [p. 9 of 409 PDF]; retrieved 2012-8-16. ==History== There have been no teams from El Salvador at the Olympic Winter Games. As of 2025, El Salvador does not have a medal. The "Comité Olímpico de El Salvador" was formed in 1949 and recognized by the IOC in 1962. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == References == ==Other websites == * El Salvador profile at London2012.com *El Salvador at SportsReference.com Olympics Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: El Salvador at the Olympics
